"Absolutely fantastic company with first class customer service." "The installation crews spent a couple of hours just on cleaning up my yard." "Richard Ford was our Sales Rep and was excellent to work with."

We had a horrible hail storm come through our area. My husband and I had no idea where to get started as far as repairs and dealing with insurance. Mark made this process so easy! We had a trouble free roof repair as well as the gutters … More Response from the owner 3 weeks ago Thank you for the kind words, Mara. We truly appreciate the opportunity to work with you all and glad we were able to make the process as easy as possible for you.

It's been amazing. The process has been super easy. When the roof guys were doing their thing they actually took time out of doing their jobs to make sure that our trash bin and are recycling bin were in the appropriate place so that they … More

I went out for quote twice for a roof replacement, which involved an insurance settlement from hail damage that occurred last year. Probably 6 to 8 estimates total. I was not aware of the Texas insurance law the first time, although many of … More Response from the owner 2 years ago Thank you for your review, Mr. Timmons. Your feedback is very helpful and Happy Holidays to you and your family!
